dcterms:creator: Bjoern H. Menze
Andras Jakab
Stefan Bauer
dcterms:description: A large-scale collection of brain MRI data consisting of 335 preprocessed volumes for each contrast, including T1-weighted, T2-weighted, and FLAIR contrasts, used for evaluating multi-contrast MRI reconstruction methods.
dcterms:title: MICCAI Multi-modal Brain Tumor Segmentation (BraTS) challenge 2019
